title: Galio rework?
body:
I'm not exactly sure if there is gonna be a galio re-work
to some he may seem boring but he's really nice, if they do rework him i hope they don't change him too much, i like his moveset, some visual updates would be nice( especially for his skins)
also anything bout kindred? i want her to be buffed but not so much that she becomes overused.
Also how do i get lvl 7 to post other things???

replies.body: i don't think that galio needs a rework cause he can win for you a WHOLE TEAMFIGHT he is maybe kinda boring  but very helpful if you have to rework him THE ONLY THING THAT YOU MUST DO IS A VISUAL REWORK NOT GAMEPLAY {{champion:3}} {{item:3174}} {{item:3001}} {{item:3027}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3111}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

I can't comment on potential changes to Galio or Kindred, as I honestly don't know and I don't want to set any sort of expectation.

As for your level issue, most of the time your Summoner and Boards profiles can fall out of sync, but a post like this discussion can force a resync, like it did here. Happy posting!
